reviews.review_msg: Loved Dara's class. The class was super engaging and she gave great feedback.  She was also a good marker who looked at the content rather than criticized the format of how you wrote your assignments. She definitely enjoyed what was she teaching.  The class was a 4 hour lecture in sort of a tutorial format.  Highly recommend. I would take again

lots of reading, whole grade is based on written assignments (which take a lot of time!), sometimes unhelpful with certain concepts that articles didn't adequately address (but she thinks they did, i guess)
